tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had been struggling to find a good dentist, came across Dr Ahuja as per my daughter's recommendation. She carefully examined me and gave me a detailed understanding of tooth implant. At the age of 65, I almost thought implant would leave me handicapped . But Dr Ahuja made sure nothing as such prevails.She personally followed up with me and helped me regained my confidence. I would highly recommend them to anyone who is seeking Dental Treatment. 
Thank You So Much Dr Ahuja.

Thank You !
